taskData.title: Create bear sprite image asset
taskData.body: Create or acquire a bear enemy sprite image to use for the new bear enemy. Since the constraint mentions using a mock or wolf sprite temporarily if bear files are hard to create, this task will create a bear sprite image asset. The sprite should follow the same format as existing wolf sprites (LoboCinza.gif, LoboVermelho.gif) with frames for idle and walking animations. Expected sprite dimensions should be 30x30 pixels per frame to match existing enemies. Place the sprite file in /src/Imagens/ directory with name 'Urso.gif' or 'Bear.gif'. The sprite should include idle frame (first row) and walking animation frames (second row, 4 frames) similar to wolf sprites.
